verses.verse: And <WG2532> I <WG1473>, brothers <WG80>, could <WG1410> not <WG3756> speak <WG2980> unto you <WG5213> as <WG5613> unto spiritual <WG4152>, but <WG235> as <WG5613> unto carnal <WG4559>, even as <WG5613> unto babes <WG3516> in <WG1722> Christ <WG5547>.

I have fed <WG4222> you <WG5209> with milk <WG1051>, and <WG2532> not <WG3756> with food <WG1033>: for <WG1063> until now <WG3768> you were not able <WG1410> to bear it <WG235>, neither <WG3777> yet <WG2089> now <WG3568> are you able <WG1410>.

For <WG1063> you are <WG2075> yet <WG2089> carnal <WG4559>: for <WG1063> since <WG3699> there is among <WG1722> you <WG5213> envying <WG2205>, and <WG2532> strife <WG2054>, and <WG2532> divisions <WG1370>, are you <WG2075> not <WG3780> carnal <WG4559>, and <WG2532> walk <WG4043> as <WG2596> men <WG444>?

For <WG1063> while <WG3752> one <WG5100> says <WG3004>, I <WG1473> <WG99999> am <WG1510> of Paul <WG3972>; and <WG1161> another <WG2087>, I <WG1473> am of Apollos <WG625>; are you <WG2075> not <WG3780> carnal <WG4559>?

Who <WG5101> then <WG3767> is <WG2076> Paul <WG3972>, and <WG1161> who <WG5101> is Apollos <WG625>, but <WG235> <WG99999> ministers <WG1249> by <WG1223> whom <WG3739> you believed <WG4100>, even <WG2532> as <WG5613> the Lord <WG2962> gave to <WG1325> every man <WG1538>?
I <WG1473> have planted <WG5452>, Apollos <WG625> watered <WG4222>; but <WG235> God <WG2316> gave the increase <WG837>.
So then <WG5620> neither <WG3777> is he <WG2076> that plants <WG5452> any thing <WG5100>, neither <WG3777> he that waters <WG4222>; but <WG235> God <WG2316> that gives the increase <WG837>.

Now <WG1161> he that <WG3588> plants <WG5452> and <WG2532> he that <WG3588> waters <WG4222> are <WG1526> one <WG1520>: and <WG1161> every man <WG1538> shall receive <WG2983> his own <WG2398> reward <WG3408> according to <WG2596> his own <WG2398> labor <WG2873>.
For <WG1063> we are <WG2070> laborers together <WG4904> with God <WG2316>: you are <WG2075> God <WG2316>'s husbandry <WG1091>, you are God <WG2316>'s building <WG3619>.

According to <WG2596> the grace <WG5485> of God <WG2316> which <WG3588> is given <WG1325> unto me <WG3427>, as <WG5613> a wise <WG4680> masterbuilder <WG753>, I have laid <WG5087> the foundation <WG2310>, and <WG1161> another <WG243> builds on it <WG2026>. But <WG1161> let <WG991> every man <WG1538> take care <WG991> how <WG4459> he builds <WG2026>.
For <WG1063> no other <WG243> foundation <WG2310> can <WG1410> man <WG3762> lay <WG5087> than <WG3844> what was laid <WG2749>, which <WG3739> is <WG2076> Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547>.

Now <WG1161> if <WG1487> any man <WG5100> builds <WG2026> upon <WG1909> this <WG5126> foundation <WG2310> gold <WG5557>, silver <WG696>, precious <WG5093> stones <WG3037>, wood <WG3586>, hay <WG5528>, stubble <WG2562>;

Every man <WG1538>'s work <WG2041> shall be made <WG1096> manifest <WG5318>: for <WG1063> the day <WG2250> shall declare it <WG1213>, because <WG3754> it shall be revealed <WG601> by <WG1722> fire <WG4442>; and <WG2532> the fire <WG4442> shall test <WG1381> each man <WG1538>'s work <WG2041> to see what sort <WG3697> it is <WG2076>.
If <WG1487> any man <WG5100>'s work <WG2041> remains <WG3306>, which <WG3739> he has built on it <WG2026>, he shall receive <WG2983> a reward <WG3306>.

If <WG1487> any man <WG5100>'s work <WG2041> shall be burned <WG2618>, he shall suffer loss <WG2210>: but <WG1161> he himself <WG846> shall be saved <WG4982>; yet <WG1161> so <WG3779> as <WG5613> by <WG1223> fire <WG4442>.
Know you <WG1492> not <WG3756> that <WG3754> you are <WG2075> the temple <WG3485> of God <WG2316>, and <WG2532> that the Spirit <WG4151> of God <WG2316> dwells <WG3611> in <WG1722> you <WG5213>?

If <WG1487> any man <WG5100> defiles <WG5351> the temple <WG3485> of God <WG2316>, him <WG5126> shall <WG5351> God <WG2316> destroy <WG5351>; for <WG1063> the temple <WG3485> of God <WG2316> is <WG2076> holy <WG40>, which <WG3748> you <WG5210> are <WG2075>.

Let <WG1818> no man <WG3367> deceive <WG1818> himself <WG1438>. If <WG1487> any man <WG5100> among <WG1722> you <WG5213> seems <WG1380> to be <WG1511> wise <WG4680> in <WG1722> this <WG5129> world <WG165>, let him become <WG1096> a fool <WG3474>, that <WG2443> he may be <WG1096> wise <WG4680>.

For <WG1063> the wisdom <WG4678> of this <WG5127> world <WG2889> is <WG2076> foolishness <WG3472> with <WG3844> God <WG2316>. For <WG1063> it is written <WG1125>, He takes <WG1405> the wise <WG4680> in <WG1722> their own <WG846> craftiness <WG3834>.
And <WG2532> again <WG3825>, The Lord <WG2962> knows <WG1097> the thoughts <WG1261> of the wise <WG4680>, that <WG3754> they are <WG1526> vain <WG3152>.
Therefore <WG5620> let <WG2744> no man <WG3367> glory <WG2744> in <WG1722> men <WG444>. For <WG1063> all things <WG3956> are <WG2076> yours <WG5216>;

Whether <WG1535> Paul <WG3972>, or <WG1535> Apollos <WG625>, or <WG1535> Cephas <WG2786>, or <WG1535> the world <WG2889>, or <WG1535> life <WG2222>, or <WG1535> death <WG2288>, or <WG1535> things present <WG1764>, or <WG1535> things to come <WG3195>; all <WG3956> are <WG2076> yours <WG5216>;
And <WG1161> you <WG5210> are Christ <WG5547>'s; and <WG1161> Christ <WG5547> is God <WG2316>'s.
